channel.title: Client Crashes When Opening Skillcape Shop Exions Source
channel.description:
I am using Exions source, I know he did fix this bug in his newer version but can't download it anymore. Anyway, when I try and open the skillcape shop the whole client crashes and the .bat gives me this error:
[img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/4048/lolxf.jpg[/img]
If you can help me fix this I will +rep you, thanks.
